website_summaries.verdict: Your best option if you're looking for an affordable eyelash enhancer that actually works.
pros: Gives rapid results, usually within just a few treatments
Darkens, lengthens and fills in lashes and brows
A good choice for sensitive skin, as it seems to cause few reactions
cons: While it does work, the results may not be as significant as some are hoping for

customer_reviews.title: The product itself is great. Have used it for years
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is great. Have used it for years. The review is for this seller. I ordered the 3.0ml size and received a 1.5ml tube with a sticker on the bottle labeling it as 3.0ml. Comparing the sizes they are identical. Not sure if it was an honest mistake but after reading that other people have had a similar issue I start to wonder. Will be returning since I paid for the 3.0ml and got the 1.5ml pretending to be the 3.0ml
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS! My lashes grew so long and gorgeous ...
customer_reviews.text: IT WORKS! My lashes grew so long and gorgeous and everyone always asks me what I use. However, if you stop using it, your lashes will fall and go back to normal. I believe the lash hairs grow in cycles and now I am losing some of the lash growth, but they always come back with the use of this product. The key is to moisturize your lashes daily (coconut oil or castor oil) and remove your eye makeup gently. Also, once i have achieved the lash growth and length I drop usage to once every other day. Taking a short break in between helps to boost growth again as well.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Y.

customer_reviews.title: Size 3.0 is as small as 1.5ml
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure how this can be? I bought the bigger size 3.0 ml. The box says 3.0 the tube says 4.5 ml and is exactly the same size as my old 1.5ml. Not sure if I got a better deal with the bigger size. Explanation?
customer_reviews.author: lmadjd

customer_reviews.title: Did they change the tube packaging?
customer_reviews.text: I got my first tube of Nutra Luxe Lash several months ago and it seemed to work fine. My lashes seem longer now and I did not experience any stinging or redness on my eyes. I ordered a new tube yesterday and received my new tube today. I was surprised to find that the new tube is a different color from the one I ordered before (plus it has an additional pink ring on the cap whereas there wasn’t one on my old tube). I’m not sure if this is authentic. I got the 3.0ml for both tubes. I will update this review after I’ve used the new tube.
customer_reviews.author: May1 Balbarin

customer_reviews.title: Don't even waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this product! I tried it for the first week, and each time, there would be barely any product coating my lashes. So after that I turned it upside down to see if anything would come out. And after thumping it against my palm to bring the product to the top, there were literally 2 specks of liquid that came out and that is it. 3 ml? More like 0.5ml, if that. Don't even waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Yaji

customer_reviews.title: 3.0 ml tube same exact size as 1.5? Rip off?
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed when I received my Nutra Luxe Lash 3.0 ml serum. I have ordered several in the past and I usually get the 1.5ml, this time I decided to go with the bigger size, 3.0. When I opened up my package I noticed the tube was the exact same size as the 1.5ml tubes not only in length but in width, and the bigger size even felt significantly lighter than my smaller tube. I do not understand how that is, being that the bigger tube should contain twice the amount as the smaller one. I have side by side pictures and videos for comparison.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Carrillo

customer_reviews.title: Length, not fullness
customer_reviews.text: This is my second tube of Nutra Luxe, and it does indeed make your lashes grow longer. So long, in fact, that you get the occasional rogue one that is so long and squirrel-y that it REALLY doesn't match the others. This product is not a substitute for false lashes or extensions, but if you're a low-maintenance kinda gal like myself, who can't be bothered to spend two damn hours and a shitton of money having someone glue hair to her face, then this plus a volumizing mascara plus a few sprigs of DIY falsies are enough.
customer_reviews.author: Lacey

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time and money
customer_reviews.text: Very sad to report that after only 3 applications, my eyes are very irritated. Followed the instructions just as they said. My eyes are so bloodshot that it cannot be hidden. My eyes are very itchy as well. I have had to discontinue use. Plus, as another person pointed out, I was shocked to see a disclaimer on the package that says "not intended to enhance eyelash growth." (What?!) Anyhow, I couldn't continue even to find out. Don't waste your $
customer_reviews.author: Scarbarb

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Results
customer_reviews.text: So glad I bought this. After months of permanent lash extensions, my eyelashes were not looking great. A friend recommended this to me and after 2 months of consistent use the results are amazing. I wish I took a before after to show the huge change but they are so much longer. You have to be consistent to see results but it is so worth it, buy this!
customer_reviews.author: Madeline

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed. Will not order again
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product on April 7 and when it arrived the tube was empty. There was no liquid in the tube. This is the first time this has ever happened and we have ordered this product several times. Very disappointed. Will not order again. Suggest not buying this product from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous banned ingredient
customer_reviews.text: This product directly caused an eye infection from a banned substance in Canada that is not banned in the USA! The symptoms are red bloodshot eyes, burning, stinging and a pale green discharge. My eye was glued shut in the morning and crusty. It was also slightly swollen. Rodin and Fields were sued for the same ingredient in April 2018. Look at the ingredients and you will see: isopropyl cloprostenate. I also experienced the darkening of the skin where you apply it on the lid. If you care for your eye health pls does buy products with this ingredient! It could have led to glaucoma. My doctor tested me for this
customer_reviews.author: Peter Young

customer_reviews.title: It truly works!
customer_reviews.text: This REALLY and truly works. I I usually started using this back in June and it’s now January and I’ve seen a tremendous difference in my natural lashes in the 7 months. The serum has made them longer and fuller looking - with mascara on, it looks like I have eyelash extensions on. I’m so glad I didn’t go through with getting eyelash extensions and went the more natural route of using this serum to help them grow. I have heard horrible things about getting eyelash extensions and how they end up ruining your natural lashes.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Regina

customer_reviews.title: Red and bloodshot eyes
customer_reviews.text: I am actually requesting a refund for this product. Used for 3 nights. The following day my eyes were red and bloodshot! I actually had a coworker ask of I was okay because of how my eyes looked. In the past my mom used this product and it worked so I’m wondering if I’m just sensitive to it, or if it’s defective.
customer_reviews.author: Dana D.

customer_reviews.title: It actually works
customer_reviews.text: I'm answering for my mother and myself. I already have lengthened lashes from using up another more expensive product that I had, but my 87 year old mother had stubby little lashes and after using this Nutra Lux product for about two months, her lashes have grown! I hope my lashes stay grown.
customer_reviews.author: BorNaSuSa

customer_reviews.title: Really works
customer_reviews.text: I've used this several times over the years and as long as I am consistent in the application, IT WORKS!! You do have to be very careful when applying to the lashes and make sure not to get it in your eyes. Most recently I purchased one for my mom to use on her eyebrows, which were extremely thin. Within approximately one month the difference was very noticeable the were full and lush.
customer_reviews.author: KAli

customer_reviews.title: Added length can go a long way.....
customer_reviews.text: I know two women that have used this product and in 6 weeks their lashes were amazingly long and lush. I have used the product for 6 weeks, and I do not have exactly the same results, altho the lashes are some longer. I'm wondering if it's because the other two women have thick hair and brows...and mine are finer. I'm happy to have some added length with this product, although may not get the same results as my friends. I'm assuming the results are different for different people.
customer_reviews.author: sugarw

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Using off and on for about 4 weeks and my lashes are the longest it's EVER been... I had absolutely NOTHING and now you can DEFINITELY see them... many compliments... little pricey but that's ok... did not want to use fake lashes... wil buy again
customer_reviews.author: lessa527

customer_reviews.title: If starts to irritate stop using!
customer_reviews.text: —If your eye starts to get irritated/ gets red on the eyelid.. stop using since it can make you blind if you continue! (Especially if you notice there’s a bump growing because of it or anything in that case I would suggest STOP using it.) Take pictures so you can notice the difference, you’ll be amazed! I used it every other day! :)
customer_reviews.author: Daiana

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work and eyelashes fell out
customer_reviews.text: Was hoping to return this product, but they are not giving me the option. I've used other products similar that perform. You don't know if it works until you try it for a time. Totally unfair I paid over $38 and it doesn't work. I understand a lot of them your lashes will fall out and then regrow. This never happened.
customer_reviews.author: Roberta R Walker

customer_reviews.title: It worked for me
customer_reviews.text: This really helped my lashes lengthen. I wish they would have stimulated more lashes to grow so they would be fuller, overall I was impressed. I stopped using this product because I noticed my eyelid becoming darker in pigmentation and they made me feel uneasy. Someone said it was because I applied too much serum.-who knows? Despite the darkening I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have eyelashes, but they were short and I ...
customer_reviews.text: I have eyelashes, but they were short and I also had a few bare spots. This product really works!! I apply once a day before I go to bed. I started seeing results about 3 weeks after I started using the product. I am on my 3rd tube and will continue to buy Nutra Luxe. I have received so many compliments on my lashes, something I never received before.
customer_reviews.author: SanJuan

customer_reviews.title: ... buying this product for several years & have seen good results. The last tube I ordered seems to ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying this product for several years & have seen good results. The last tube I ordered seems to be empty. There is barely any if the product on the application brush. What happened to your product.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Landers

customer_reviews.title: Great!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrific value!!! Works just like the more expensive brands. My eyelashes are so long! It lasts forever!! I love it and will buy it again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Cookie Lover

customer_reviews.title: First and Second/third order not identical
customer_reviews.text: This was the third time I ordered and it was a totally different color (yellow gold) item again. Tried it and does not make my lashes grow as fast as the first original order I received (tub as shown on image). My eyelash line seems to be a bit irritated and itchy. Will stop placing orders in the future. As the second and third order is different from my first one order.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Monsivais

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: The inside lashes closest to my tear ducts don’t grow much if at all. After using this product I have lashes all the way across my rye lid. Fuller, liger beautiful lashes!
customer_reviews.author: Kim G

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: What I like about this, is that it doesn't have any nasty side effects that go along with it. I've been using it for over a year; and haven't had any issues. The bottle last quite a long time as well. I suggest using it every other night for more of a maintenance routine, though.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonMom

customer_reviews.title: Best product for the money
customer_reviews.text: Best product for the money!! I used Latisse for years and years and have never received so many compliments on my lashes since starting to use this about 7 months ago! Only took about a month to notice a big difference in my lash growth. Highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super lashes!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! I bought the 1.5 first to try it out and I ran out in 2 months! I posted a picture with mascara and here is one without mascara. They are full and curly. I get compliments on them everyday. I will forever use this product!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I’ve seen the end results on a relative of mine and it trully elongates lashes, hers are almost as long as reaching her eyebrows. It didn’t give me any allegies but I am still waiting results.
customer_reviews.author: Tish

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this product for at least 2 years and highly recommend it. It’s made a huge difference in the condition and length of my eye lashes - like night an day. I wish I could find a product that would do the same for my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Leotasgarden

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Nudes Luxe slash MD for over 8 years.....i was surprised to see tube a different color than normal...hmmmm not working on lashes as in the past....not sure if product is defective or what. I will continue to purchase , but not from this company
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good..but..
customer_reviews.text: I loved the lash serum, although it does have a side affect but there's also a couple of problems as well. After I stopped using the lash serum my lashes have gotten thinner and shorter, eventually losing their curl. In addition, my lashes have fallen while using the product. I thought it was just my body doing its thing until I tested them on my eyebrows, to my surprise my brow hairs started falling off too, this was the reason why I stopped using the lash serum. Don't get me wrong, it made my lashes beautiful but beware of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Isela C.

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and works wonders!!!!! I have used several different lash enhancement serum that’s tripe this price and this product works the best!!!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: This product was recommended to me by a friend and as much as ...
customer_reviews.text: This product was recommended to me by a friend and as much as I wanted to love it, it's just too much of an irritant. My eyes get bloodshot and my eyelids swell slightly. I know for many this is a "small price to pay" for long lashes, but so much irritation just can't be a good sign! I'll stick with eyelash extensions.
customer_reviews.author: hensley

customer_reviews.title: Longer, fuller lashes? Yes please!
customer_reviews.text: I have thin lashes, and even with mascara, they still look short and clumpy. I've been using Nutrilash for about 6 months continuously, and I have noticed that my lashes are longer and thicker. It's great! I just put it on once at night, before I go to bed. When I first started using it, it did make my eyes red, but I have gotten used to the formula and it doesn't bother me anymore. Definitely recommend if you're looking for longer, fuller lashes!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole G

customer_reviews.title: Great product but expires too soon.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for about 2 years now and I am very happy with the results! However on this last purchase I ordered 3.0 ml and received 4.5 ml that expires 7/19. My 3.0 ml usually lasts me about six months. So I’m not happy that what I just bought will expire in 3 months. Usually the expiration date is at least 9 months out. So I’m not sure what to do. Should I use it past the expiration date?
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Leech

customer_reviews.title: Used to work, not anymore.
customer_reviews.text: I started occasionally buying this product a few years ago and it worked great! It did irritate my eyes a little bit, but I applied it at night and there was no problem. It really worked great! After just 2 weeks of using it every night it made my lashes long and thick. Now, they have apparently diluted down the formula. It no longer works and I have been using it consistently for several months. It's a shame that they changed it. But, it's not FDA approved so the makers are under no obligation to maintain quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do you think this will lengthen your lashes?
customer_reviews.text: The manufacturers details for Nutraluxe Luxe Lash 3.0 ml claims it will "help your lashes reach their full potential in length & fullness, the 1.5 ml claims growth enhancer. The 4.5 claims it boosts the length.... Imagine my disappointment when I received the 3.0 ml size and the Disclaimer on the box read: "Conditioner not intended ..... to promote new hair growth. I returned it despite the numerous reviews it received because it cant possibly lengthen your lashes if the company claims on the box, that it isnt intended to promote new growth".
customer_reviews.author: EmmagirlTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: I would apply it at night and the next day my eyes felt like I had sand in them
customer_reviews.text: This product burned my eyes so badly. I would apply it at night and the next day my eyes felt like I had sand in them. Blood shot terribly. I'm not sure what happened because I have used this in the past and had great results. I will not purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: sharrielea gauthier

customer_reviews.title: Works awesome!!!!
customer_reviews.text: A friend of mine had used this and I was amazed with her results. After reading some reviews on here, I was a little weary. Soo happy I went ahead and ordered it. It works so well. You just need to remember to apply it every day!! I was amazed! So glad I didn’t spend the money on the R+F one!!!
customer_reviews.author: AMB

customer_reviews.title: Great Results At One-Third The Cost
customer_reviews.text: Great results for longer thicker lashes at 1/3 the cost of others on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Paulette

customer_reviews.title: Great results within a few months
customer_reviews.text: Great results within a few months. Noticed a difference within a couple of weeks. Less expensive and less of a pain in the ook than extensions. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mollie Y.

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: REALLY REALLY WORKS AND SAVES A BUNCH COMPARED TO SALON WORK!
customer_reviews.author: SJ

customer_reviews.title: Not exactly what I ordered
customer_reviews.text: I see many people has same problem . The product itself is great. Have used it for years? but always bought 1,5 ml/ I ordered the 3.0ml size this time and received a 1.5ml tube with a sticker on the box labeling it as 3.0ml and color of tube was much darker than I had before . Going to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Iryna Naumenko

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing! It took 6-8 weeks before I saw any growth and initially the growth was inconsistent. But eventually all my lashes grew uniformally and are beautiful! The small tube lasted 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea L. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: I will update progress
customer_reviews.text: It arrived on time. I hope it works! I'll send update later.
customer_reviews.author: Tosha

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product. However, I don’t know where to put this, but I got WOOLASH and that product is GARBAGE.. made my lashes either fall out or break off to nothing! Horrible product! I want a refund!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: judith moye

customer_reviews.title: Just make sure you don't exs
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a birthday gift. I love this product. I use it every day. My lashes are so long I have a problem of them rubbing on my glasses!! I have people ask me all the time are my lashes real. I tell them yes they are but I use a lash serum. Would recommend this product for all😊😊
customer_reviews.author: Gail O'Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Lashes for days!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. Im a repeat customer. It really does work!

customer_reviews.title: Still a believer!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using it for a couple of years now. The results are not as obvious as they were when I first started using it, but I'm gonna stick with it!
customer_reviews.author: Riz'n Star

customer_reviews.title: Julie45
customer_reviews.text: I love this lash growing serum! I have used several times in the past and always have great results!! Highly recommend!!!

customer_reviews.title: Burns and irritates
customer_reviews.text: I used this product 1 time Followed directions as indicated in box and woke up with 2 very bloodshot eyes!!! I returned the product and will NEVER order again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It really works
customer_reviews.text: I use this on my eyelashes and it really works great.....It takes a week or 2 to start working....Amazing results..!!!!

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product. Been using it for years
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. Been using it for years. My lashes are VERY long...even bottom ones.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My lashes are naturally beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I can’t live without it! This stuff truly works! Reasonable price
customer_reviews.author: Madeleine Vargas

customer_reviews.title: This works
customer_reviews.text: This is the best stuff ever. It really works. Every female in my family has started using this product because of the results I got with it. It can cause a little irritation when you first start using it, but it only lasts a day or two and it's more like dry eyes than irritation. I use it on brows and lashes and wish that 3oz lasted longer.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh May

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughter at her request. She says she loves it, and it works exactly like she wanted it to.
customer_reviews.author: Donald K. Williams

customer_reviews.title: It got safely to the person for whom I bought it.
customer_reviews.text: The product I have used before worked amazingly well. Assume this one will work as well for my friend.
customer_reviews.author: J. Cyphers

customer_reviews.title: Really lengthens your lashes!
customer_reviews.text: For longer lashes, get this stuff! It won't make them thicker though, only longer! Seriously, people ask me daily if my lashes are real. And I get to say YES!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs_S

customer_reviews.title: Best product! People ask me how do I get ...
customer_reviews.text: Best product!People ask me how do I get my lashes so long.I am 56 and just using mascara just doesn't work!You will see a difference after a few weeks.The price is so much less on amazon!

customer_reviews.title: Best lash serum I’ve ever used.

customer_reviews.text: I'm sensitive to most products and this doesn't bother me plus I can really see results!

customer_reviews.title: This works just as well as Rodan and Fields!!
customer_reviews.text: This is just as amazing as Rodan and Fields Lash Boost, at a fraction of the price!!

customer_reviews.title: Happy with it.
customer_reviews.text: This works! I was skeptical, but my lashes are naturally longer than they have ever been. The Only reason I did not rate this a 5, was this is the only lash serum I've tried, so I have no comparison to other products.

customer_reviews.title: i want a new one
customer_reviews.text: The product could be good if the packaging wasnt all messed up

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. Initially this product was recommended to me by a friend who is an RN so I felt comfortable trying it out. My eyelashes have become much healthier since I started using it and they are really long!!! People ask me if I have eyelash extensions!

customer_reviews.title: Seriously! This stuff works!
customer_reviews.text: I normally don’t write reviews unless I LOVE a product! Well I love this stuff! It works!

customer_reviews.text: This product. I have never used a prescription lash product, but I think this works great!

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Wow, I have to say I have tried many lash strengtheners, but this one is by far one of the best!

It's been a month and all my lashes are back and then some;) the picture I added was after a long hard day with some crying involved and still you can see the mascara did not smudge and my lashes are long and full.

customer_reviews.text: Love it, eye lashes look so long and I only have to use it a few time/week!!! Definitely recommend to others!!

customer_reviews.title: Really do love your product and amazon
customer_reviews.text: I wanted the nutraluxe lash that would help my eyelashes to grow or enhance but I think I may have picked the wrong one. I have had your product before as a gift from a friend but I will try again. Really do love your product and amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really works and lashes longer than ever been. I'm hooked!
customer_reviews.author: ken and anita

customer_reviews.title: I had before and it work better. This one doesn't seem to be working
customer_reviews.text: I had before and it work better. This one doesn't seem to be working. My lashes are staying the same, they don't grow.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: This product really works! I have used it several times and 2 weeks in my lashes are very thick and full. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: K. Adams

customer_reviews.title: Lash enhancer
customer_reviews.text: It actually does make your lashes longer. It may take a couple of months to see results but it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: janet Sculler

customer_reviews.title: Listing discrepancy
customer_reviews.text: The product said it was 3 oz as opposed to other listings which were 1.5 oz. However when I received the product it was exactly the same size as previous containers which were listed as 1.5. As I paid more money for the larger one I would like to know why it isn't bigger? Has the same sized container just got more product inside ?
customer_reviews.author: bookworm

customer_reviews.title: Great results! But it does make my eyes bloodshot ...
customer_reviews.text: Great results! But it does make my eyes bloodshot if even a little get in them.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda English

customer_reviews.title: Very good product. does what it says
customer_reviews.text: Very good product.does what it says.only I notice some redness on my eyelids.it usually fades if i stop using it for a few days. Definitely grows eyelashes!
customer_reviews.author: LESLIE TREUTEL

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love it, I get asked a lot if I'm wearing false lashes...
customer_reviews.author: Luciana Lancioni

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Made my eyelashes grow long and beautiful in about a month.
customer_reviews.author: Yolene Vega Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: It honestly works
customer_reviews.text: Everyone asks if I am wearing falsies! Give it 8 weeks, then never go without it!
customer_reviews.author: chelseyellis

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I don't feel this is working growing lashes like I had hoped ??
customer_reviews.author: judith d waltz

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome!!! Takes a few weeks to get going. My lashes are definitely much longer and fuller. Love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... over the years this one is by far the best!
customer_reviews.text: Of all the eyelash/brow serums I've used over the years this one is by far the best!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Niggeling

customer_reviews.title: I like it a lot
customer_reviews.text: It helps my lashes and my eyebrows growing longer. I like it a lot .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Works like Latisse but without the irritation.I use it on my thinning eyebrows as well.

customer_reviews.title: Maybe I'm just allergic to it

product_meta.title: Nutra Luxe Lash MD, 3.0 ml
product_meta.description: Optimize the look of your natural lashes. The NutraLuxe MD Eyelash Conditioner is designed to enhance the appearance of your natural eyelashes. The combination of scientifically developed ingredients helps to nourish and moisturize your lashes, while protecting from breakage. Use the NutraLuxe Eyelash Conditioner daily for beautiful lashes.
